name: Fall 🍂
description:
Aim for the leaf pile and watch out for crows! Thanks for playing! 

This game was created for the Great Harvest Game Jam 2020

Essential tip: In order to reset levels and their items, you will need to return to the title screen when the game asks if you would like to "Go Again?"

Development:

We're a team of two who decided to make our first game as part of the Great Harvest game jam!... we learned a lot XD

Using the restrictions from the jam as our guide, we found direction in making the big decisions: artstyle and gameplay. Then it was the matter of learning how to use our game engine: Godot, our art software: Aseprite, and all those little things that we hadn't considered until we got behind the curtain of game development.

So, if you too have been wanting to make your own game, give it a shot! You'll probably enjoy the experience- just don't be afraid to watch a few tutorials and get your foot in the door :). 

Thanks again for playing our game! Hopefully, the crows didn't spike you into the ground too hard... cue evil laugh

Credits:

All art and music was created by us, for use in Fall.  Some sound effects and our fonts were made using outside resources! Watch the credits in game to see the full list.

Special thanks to Benjamin from HeartBeast for your YouTube  tutorials and inspiration!

Future Plans:

We're now hooked on game dev and creating new experiences in our game! More hats, powerups, characters, etc.. are on the way. So, Please share any bugs you may find, as we do intend to continue developing this.  Also, let us know if you have any ideas for new elements- we'll probably be just as excited about it as you!

Playable doggo coming... sometime! :D

Bugs:

- The Spinny Cap allows players to fly outside the level

- The crows' knockback seemingly ignores gravity >:)

- Performance issues in browser: try reloading the page after closing other tabs! If this doesn't work try our .exe  for Windows!

Feature Requests:

- More levels!

- Custom falling leaves shader!
